translations.translation: So when We recite it, follow its recitation.
So, as We recite it, follow its reading.
And so when We recite it, follow its recitation attentively;
When We recite it, follow its recitation (by Us).
So when We have read it, you should thereupon follow what is read.
And when We have recited it to you, then follow its recitation.
Therefore when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
So, when We recite it, follow thou its recitation.
And when We read it, follow thou the reading;
When We have recited it, follow its words attentively;
Wherefore when We reciteit, follow thou the reciting thereof.
And when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
But when We have promulgated it, follow thou its recital (as promulgated):
And when We have recited it to you [O Muhammad SAW through Jibrael (Gabriel)], then follow you its (the Quran's) recital.
When We recite it, follow its recitation.
Then, when We have recited it, follow its recitation.
So when We have recited it [through Gabriel], then follow its recitation.
[75:18] So, when We recite it, to you, by means of Gabriel’s recital, follow its recitation, listen to its recitation: thus the Prophet (s) would listen to it and then repeat it.

(And when We read it) when Gabriel reads to you, (follow thou the reading) you, Muhammad, read after him; it is also said this means: what We finish composing it with all the lawful and unlawful contained therein, do you follow its composition;

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ } معناه فاتبعْ حَلالَهُ وحَرامَهُ

translations.translation: And His saying (Allāh), "So when We have recited it [the Qur'ān], then follow its recitation" - its meaning is, "So follow its lawful [commands] and unlawful [prohibitions]."

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبعدما سمعت ما سمعت يا أكمل الرسل فأجر عليه، واذكر { فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ } أي: القرآن حين الوحي بلسان جبريل عليك { فَٱتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ } [القيامة: 18] أي: تذكر وتتبع قراءته
